Title: VNotify - .NET AppNotifications Library
Description: VNotify provides a fully managed interface to the AppNotifications service, making it easy to send out push notifications from a .NET application to an iPhone. Target iPhones must have the third-party AppNotifications service installed and enabled.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
VNotify provides a fully managed interface to the AppNotifications service, making it easy to send out push notifications from a .NET application to an iPhone. Target iPhones must have the third-party AppNotifications service installed and enabled.



Requirements
  • iPhone
  • AppNotifications Application (Available Through App Store)
  • .NET Framework 3.5
